mapper.sql: id, sn, no, ecu, ecu_config_word, supplier_code, hardware_ver, software_ver, hardware_no, software_no, mac, hsm, extra, vin, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_veh_part ( id, sn, no, ecu, ecu_config_word, supplier_code, hardware_ver, software_ver, hardware_no, software_no, mac, hsm, extra, vin, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{sn}, #{no}, #{ecu}, #{ecuConfigWord}, #{supplierCode}, #{hardwareVer}, #{softwareVer}, #{hardwareNo}, #{softwareNo}, #{mac}, #{hsm}, #{extra}, #{vin}, #{sort}, #{description}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{modifyBy}, 1, 1 )

INSERT INTO tb_veh_part ( id, sn, no, ecu, ecu_config_word, supplier_code, hardware_ver, software_ver, hardware_no, software_no, mac, hsm, extra, vin, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.sn}, #{item.no}, #{item.ecu}, #{item.ecuConfigWord}, #{item.supplierCode}, #{item.hardwareVer}, #{item.softwareVer}, #{item.hardwareNo}, #{item.softwareNo}, #{item.mac}, #{item.hsm}, #{item.extra}, #{item.vin}, #{item.sort}, #{item.description}, now(), #{item.createBy}, now(), #{item.modifyBy}, 1, 1 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_veh_part t SET
t.sn = #{sn},
t.no = #{no},
t.ecu = #{ecu},
t.ecu_config_word = #{ecuConfigWord},
t.supplier_code = #{supplierCode},
t.hardware_ver = #{hardwareVer},
t.software_ver = #{softwareVer},
t.hardware_no = #{hardwareNo},
t.software_no = #{softwareNo},
t.mac = #{mac},
t.hsm = #{hsm},
t.extra = #{extra},
t.vin = #{vin},
t.sort = #{sort},
t.description = #{description},
t.modify_by = #{modifyBy},
t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_veh_part t SET t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now(), t.row_valid = 0 WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_veh_part t WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_veh_part t WHERE t.id = #{value} AND t.row_valid = 1

SELECT FROM tb_veh_part t WHERE t.row_valid = 1
ORDER BY t.id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_veh_part t WHERE t.row_valid = 1
